verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> there <S%G2258>was<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> who <S%G2192>had<s%> his <S%G5495>hand<s%> <S%G3583>withered<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G3906>watched<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G1487>whether<s%> he would <S%G2323>heal<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> on the sabbath <S%G4521>day<s%>; <S%G2443>that<s%> they might <S%G2723>accuse<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto the <S%G1519>man<s%> that <S%G2192>had<s%> his <S%G5495>hand<s%> <S%G3583>withered<s%>, <S%G1453>Stand<s%> <S%G444>forth<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, Is it <S%G1832>lawful<s%> on the sabbath <S%G4521>day<s%> to do <S%G15>good<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> to do <S%G2554>harm<s%>? to <S%G4982>save<s%> a <S%G5590>life<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> to <S%G615>kill<s%>? <S%G1161>But<s%> they held their <S%G4623>peace<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when he had looked round <S%G4017>about<s%> on <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G3709>anger<s%>, being <S%G4818>grieved<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> the <S%G4457>hardening<s%> <S%G2588>of<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%>, he <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto the <S%G444>man<s%>, Stretch <S%G1614>forth<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G1614>stretched<s%> it <S%G1614>forth<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%> was <S%G600>restored<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> went <S%G1831>out<s%>, and <S%G2112>straightway<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> the <S%G2265>Herodians<s%> <S%G4160>took<s%> <S%G4824>counsel<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3704>how<s%> they might <S%G622>destroy<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G402>withdrew<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> the <S%G2281>sea<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G4128>multitude<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%>; <S%G846><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2449>Judaea<s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2401>Idumaea<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4008>beyond<s%> the <S%G2446>Jordan<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G5184>Tyre<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4605>Sidon<s%>, a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G4128>multitude<s%>, <S%G191>hearing<s%> what great <S%G3745>things<s%> he <S%G4160>did<s%>, <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G2036>spake<s%> <S%G3101>to<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> a little <S%G4142>boat<s%> should <S%G4342>wait<s%> on <S%G846>him<s%> because <S%G1223>of<s%> the <S%G3793>crowd<s%>, <S%G2443>lest<s%> they should <S%G2346>throng<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>:

for <S%G1063><s%> he had <S%G2323>healed<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%>; insomuch <S%G5620>that<s%> as many <S%G3745>as<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G3148>plagues<s%> pressed <S%G1968>upon<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> that they <S%G2443>might<s%> <S%G680>touch<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirits<s%>, <S%G3752>whensoever<s%> they <S%G2334>beheld<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, fell down <S%G4363>before<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2896>cried<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G4771>Thou<s%> <S%G1488>art<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G3754>God<s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> he2008, 4183 <S%G2008>charged<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> much <S%G2443>that<s%> they <S%G5318>should<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G5318>known<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he goeth <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3735>mountain<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4341>calleth<s%> unto him <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> himself <S%G2309>would<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G4160>appointed<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> they might <S%G5600>be<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> he might <S%G649>send<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G649>forth<s%> to <S%G2784>preach<s%>,
and <S%G2532><s%> to <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> to cast <S%G1544>out<s%> <S%G1140>demons<s%>:
and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G2007>he<s%> <S%G3686>surnamed<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2385>James<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> son of <S%G2199>Zebedee<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> the <S%G80>brother<s%> of <S%G2385>James<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G2007>he<s%> <S%G3686>surnamed<s%> <S%G993>Boanerges<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%>, <S%G5207>Sons<s%> of <S%G1027>thunder<s%>:

and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G406>Andrew<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5376>Philip<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G918>Bartholomew<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3156>Matthew<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2381>Thomas<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2385>James<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> son of <S%G256>Alphaeus<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2280>Thaddaeus<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> the <S%G2581>Cananaean<s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2455>Judas<s%> <S%G2469>Iscariot<s%>, <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3860>betrayed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G2064>cometh<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G3624>house<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> cometh <S%G4905>together<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%>, so <S%G5620>that<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G1410>could<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> so much <S%G3383>as<s%> <S%G5315>eat<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G191>when<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3844>friends<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G1831>it<s%>, they went out to lay <S%G2902>hold<s%> on <S%G846>him<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> they <S%G3004>said<s%>, He is beside <S%G3754>himself<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> <S%G3588>that<s%> came <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%>, He <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G954>Beelzebub<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%>, <S%G1722>By<s%> the <S%G758>prince<s%> of the <S%G1140>demons<s%> casteth he <S%G1544>out<s%> the <S%G3754>demons<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G4341>called<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> unto <S%G3004>him<s%>, and said unto <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3850>parables<s%>, <S%G4459>How<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G4567>Satan<s%> cast <S%G1544>out<s%> <S%G4567>Satan<s%>?
And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> a <S%G932>kingdom<s%> be <S%G3307>divided<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> <S%G1438>itself<s%>, <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> <S%G3756>cannot<s%> <S%G2476>stand<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> a <S%G3614>house<s%> be <S%G3307>divided<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> <S%G1438>itself<s%>, <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G3614>house<s%> will <S%G3756>not<s%> be able to <S%G2476>stand<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G4567>Satan<s%> hath risen <S%G450>up<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> is <S%G3307>divided<s%>, <S%G1410>he<s%> <S%G3756>cannot<s%> <S%G2476>stand<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2192>hath<s%> an <S%G5056>end<s%>.

But <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3614>house<s%> of the strong <S%G2478>man<s%>, and <S%G1283>spoil<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4632>goods<s%>, <S%G3361>except<s%> <S%G1210>he<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%> <S%G1210>bind<s%> the strong <S%G2478>man<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> he will <S%G1283>spoil<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3614>house<s%>.

Verily <S%G281><s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G3956>All<s%> their <S%G265>sins<s%> shall be <S%G863>forgiven<s%> unto the <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G444>men<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> their <S%G988>blasphemies<s%> <S%G3745>wherewith<s%> <S%G302>soever<s%> they shall <S%G3754>blaspheme<s%>:

but <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3739>whosoever<s%> <S%G302>shall<s%> <S%G987>blaspheme<s%> <S%G1519>against<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G1519>never<s%> <S%G859>forgiveness<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1777>guilty<s%> of an <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2920>sin<s%>:
because <S%G3754><s%> they <S%G3004>said<s%>, He <S%G2192>hath<s%> an <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%>.

And <S%G3767><s%> there <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3384>mother<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%>, <S%G2476>standing<s%> <S%G1854>without<s%>, they <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G5455>calling<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> a <S%G3793>multitude<s%> was <S%G2521>sitting<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>; <S%G1161>and<s%> they <S%G2036>say<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2400>Behold<s%>, <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3384>mother<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%> <S%G1854>without<s%> <S%G2212>seek<s%> for <S%G4571>thee<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G611>answereth<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, and <S%G3004>saith<s%>, <S%G5101>Who<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3384>mother<s%> <S%G2228>and<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%>?

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4017>looking<s%> <S%G2945>round<s%> on them that <S%G2521>sat<s%> round <S%G2945>about<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, he <S%G3004>saith<s%>, <S%G1492>Behold<s%>, <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3384>mother<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%>!

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G302>whosoever<s%> shall <S%G4160>do<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, the <S%G3778>same<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G79>sister<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3384>mother<s%>.
